Package org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins

Interface IsColorSchemesDefaultOptions

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColorSchemesDefaultOptions, ColorSchemesOptions
    interface IsColorSchemesDefaultOptions
    Maps the default global options for ColorSchemes.ID plugin.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default double getBackgroundColorAlpha()
      The transparency value for the background color.
      default String getSchemeCategory()
      Returns the color scheme category.
      default String getSchemeName()
      Returns the color scheme name.
      default SchemeScope getSchemeScope()
      Returns the color scheme scope when the scheme is applied to hoving flex datasets, like bars charts.
      default boolean isReverse()
      If set to true, the order of the colors in the selected scheme is reversed.

    • Method Detail

      • getSchemeCategory

        default String getSchemeCategory()
        Returns the color scheme category.
        Returns:
        the color scheme category

      • getSchemeName

        default String getSchemeName()
        Returns the color scheme name.

      • getSchemeScope

        default SchemeScope getSchemeScope()
        Returns the color scheme scope when the scheme is applied to hoving flex datasets, like bars charts.
        Returns:
        the color scheme cope when the scheme is applied to hoving flex datasets, like bars charts

      • getBackgroundColorAlpha

        default double getBackgroundColorAlpha()
        The transparency value for the background color. Must be a number between 0.0 (fully transparent) and 1.0 (no transparency).
        Returns:
        the transparency value for the background color

      • isReverse

        default boolean isReverse()
        If set to true, the order of the colors in the selected scheme is reversed.
        Returns:
        if set to true, the order of the colors in the selected scheme is reversed
